tool_description: The Artificial Intelligence News API is a web service that provides access to news articles related to the field of artificial intelligence from around the world.
name: Artificial intelligence News API
title: Artificial intelligence News API

api_list.name: Get News From All News Sources Related to Artificial Intelligence
api_list.description: This end point will return back all the artificial intelligence news from all over the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/ai-news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Recent News From a Single News Source
api_list.description: This will return all the artificial intelligence news from a single news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/ai-news/forbes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com/ai-news/{paperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "artificial-intelligence-news-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
